climbs.name: Wild Things
climbs.fa: Jonathan Garlough, James Dickson & Tom Zimmerman

content.description: Look for the obvious chimney on the left side of the crag. Climb up the left facing corner into the big chimney. Pull over the small roof to a large horizontal crack. Traverse a few feet left to a massive jug. Continue up the featured headwall with cracks to the top. Use a tree for an anchor.
content.location: The Main Cliff. The Chimney Left of the blocky arete

content.description: Start on the left side of the cliff by the left chimney route. Zig Zag up to a fixed pin on Angel of Sin. Traverse right on a ledge to blocks which lead to the upper face (bolt). Climb the face placing gear to the trees above.

A nice moderate gear route up the center of the cliff. Start 5' left of Good for the Soul. Climb up small seams to a ledge and a small roof. Pull the roof with a crack past a small pine to a large sloping ledge. Punch it up the featured final headwall to the top. Belay from a tree.

climbs.name: Good for the Soul
climbs.fa: James Dickson, Jonathan Garlough & Tom Zimmerman

content.description: Start 10' left of CMC Crack in a short corner just left of a large maple at the base of the cliff. Climb the corner for 10' and move right to a stance (bolt). Continue up the face placing gear past two more bolts. Move right around the juniper bush on top and use the tree anchor for CMC Crack.
content.location: The Main Cliff. 10' left of CMC Crack  [NOTE: I think more like 20 ft left. R Hall Admin.]

climbs.name: CMC Crack
climbs.fa: James Dickson, Jonathan Garlough & Tom Zimmerman

content.description: Start up a blocky right facing corner to a hand crack 10' up. Follow the crack and featured face to a pine tree on a small ledge at half height. From here follow the pockets to a pin and jam the awesome crack to the tree anchor on top.
content.protection:
Standard Rack, Pin, Tree Anchor 

  [NOTE 2017-07-09: The now-5-year-old pin still looks good, but a 0.75 (green) Camalot fits a nice "pod" about 6" below it. RHall Admin.]
content.location: Just left of the chossy alcove

climbs.name: Clean Yer Act Up
climbs.fa: Tom Zimmerman, Jonathan Garlough & James Dickson

content.description: Start the same as CMC Crack. Climb the initial corner to a stance. Step right to gain a horizontal and move up to a small foot ledge at a left facing flake (bolt). Make the crux moves and continue to the tree anchor for CMC Crack.
Start at the right end of the main cliff where a rock buttress meets the cliff. Climb a shallow groove on great holds placing gear to the top.

climbs.name: Angel of Sin
climbs.fa: Jonathan Garlough, Tom Zimmerman & James Dickson

content.description: Start 20' left of the chimney system on Wild Things. Climb up a short slab and clip a pin. Move left under the roof and up a dirty gully for a few feet. Move up and right on some stacked blocks to a bolt on the upper headwall. Fire straight up on vertical seams and horizontals placing gear to the top. Use a tree about 30' back for an anchor.
content.location: The Main Cliff. 20' left of Wild Things

content.description: The Main Cliff is the first section of cliff you will come to on the approach trail. The cliff is around 60' tall and fairly moderate. The climbing is mixed and really fun on featured rock.
